text: Development (Special Provision) Bill will be presented in Parliament next February, said Minister of Development Strategies and International Trade Malik Samarawickreme. Addressing media yesterday in Colombo, he further added that this Bill would not pave the way for a Super Minister as accused by several opposition parties.Further, the minister added that, through this Bill, it will facilitate the investors coming here to easily get their work done through a one-stop shop.
title: Development (Special Provision) Bill in Parliament next February
